body.p: However, if Company A distributes to its shareholders shares of Subsidiary B representing only a non‑controlling interest in Subsidiary B and retains control of Subsidiary B, the transaction is not within the scope of the Interpretation. Company A accounts for the distribution in accordance with IFRS 10 Consolidated Financial Statements. Company A controls Company B both before and after the transaction.
